mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO AS fileNo, ORIGINAL_NAME AS originalName, MEMBERS_NO AS memberNo, LOCATION AS location, PAY AS pay, WRITE_DATE AS writeDate, MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, BIRTH_DAY AS birthDay, CERT_FA_YN AS certFaYN, CERT_HE_YN AS certHeYN, CERT_RE_YN AS certReYN, CERT_TE_YN AS certTeYN, AVG_GRADE AS avgGrade FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM JOB_OFFER_LIST WHERE DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE #{START}<=RNUM AND RNUM<=#{END}+9
